title: (x) Old boat book/model project - various {gang}
content:
I'm helping a friend do a book on an old Dansih Boat, we have all these ol pictures and a model builder is building a Down Scale version of the boat - i need help to identify the font use for the boat name on the sides.   
   
So if anyone could help me out it would be great.   
   
/ Jan   
   
 ![Boat seen from side with type](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224225im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/38281.jpg)
author: ponpon

comments.content:
That ain't no font - it's hand painted. You could try [Interstate](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224225/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/interstate/bold/testdrive.html?s=PETERSEN&p=72) or [Din](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224225/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-din/bold/testdrive.html?s=PETERSEN&p=72) to get a similar look.   
But you won't match this with a single font, the Rs don't match.

If the diagonal curve on the S is important, check out Agency from Font Bureau.   
   
 [http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/font\_frames.tpl?cart=10872258983700823&fontname=Agency](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224225/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/font_frames.tpl?cart=10872258983700823&fontname=Agency)

Thanks for you quick response, i have tried the DIN and that almost did the Job - so maybe i just have to Strech & bend i a little bit.   
   
Thanks again   
   
/ Jan

Thanks for you quick response, i have tried the DIN and that almost did the Job - so maybe i just have to Strech & bend i a little bit.   
   
Thanks again   
   
/ Jan

Thanks for you quick response, i have tried the DIN and that almost did the Job - so maybe i just have to Strech & bend i a little bit.   
   
Thanks again   
   
/ Jan

Thanks for you quick response, i have tried the DIN and that almost did the Job - so maybe i just have to Strech & bend i a little bit.   
   
Thanks again   
   
/ Jan

Or, for the handpainted 'look & feel', you may want to take a look at ' [Landry Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224225/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ephemera/landry-gothic/)', a nearly free font, by Andrew Leman.. [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ephemera/landry-gothic/landry-gothic/testdrive.html?s=ETERSDENMARK&p=48](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224225/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ephemera/landry-gothic/landry-gothic/testdrive.html?s=ETERSDENMARK&p=48)   
_( A type I really like, somehow, I may add.. )_
